verses.verse: And he heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Laban's <S%H3837><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> hath taken away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was our father's; <S%H1><s%> and of that which <S%H4480><s%> <S%H834><s%> was our father's <S%H1><s%> hath he gotten <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> glory. <S%H3519><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> beheld <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the countenance <S%H6440><s%> of Laban, <S%H3837><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was not <S%H369><s%> toward <S%H5973><s%> him as before. <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> and to thy kindred; <S%H4138><s%> and I will be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and Leah <S%H3812><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his flock, <S%H6629><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> unto them, I <S%H595><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> your father's <S%H1><s%> countenance, <S%H6440><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> it is not <S%H369><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> me as before; <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%> but the God <S%H430><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> hath been <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me.
And ye <S%H859><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> my power <S%H3581><s%> I have served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> your father. <S%H1><s%>

And your father <S%H1><s%> hath deceived <S%H2048><s%> me, and changed <S%H2498><s%> <S%H853><s%> my wages <S%H4909><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> times; <S%H4489><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> suffered <S%H5414><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> to hurt <S%H7489><s%> <S%H5978><s%> me.

If <S%H518><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3541><s%> The speckled <S%H5348><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thy wages; <S%H7939><s%> then all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H6629><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> speckled: <S%H5348><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3541><s%> The ringstreaked <S%H6124><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thy hire; <S%H7939><s%> then bore <S%H3205><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H6629><s%> ringstreaked. <S%H6124><s%>
Thus God <S%H430><s%> hath taken away <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> and given <S%H5414><s%> them to me.

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> that the cattle <S%H6629><s%> conceived, <S%H3179><s%> that I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> in a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the rams <S%H6260><s%> which leaped <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the cattle <S%H6629><s%> were ringstreaked, <S%H6124><s%> speckled, <S%H5348><s%> and grizzled. <S%H1261><s%>
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me in a dream, <S%H2472><s%> saying, Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> And I said, <S%H559><s%> Here <S%H2009><s%> am I.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Lift up <S%H5375><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> thine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and see, <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the rams <S%H6260><s%> which leap <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the cattle <S%H6629><s%> are ringstreaked, <S%H6124><s%> speckled, <S%H5348><s%> and grizzled: <S%H1261><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> unto thee.

I <S%H595><s%> am the God <S%H410><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou anointedst <S%H4886><s%> the pillar, <S%H4676><s%> and where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou vowedst <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto me: now <S%H6258><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> get thee out <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of thy kindred. <S%H4138><s%>

And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and Leah <S%H3812><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Is there yet <S%H5750><s%> any portion <S%H2506><s%> or inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for us in our father's <S%H1><s%> house? <S%H1004><s%>

Are we not <S%H3808><s%> counted <S%H2803><s%> of him strangers? <S%H5237><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he hath sold <S%H4376><s%> us, and hath quite devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H398><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> our money. <S%H3701><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the riches <S%H6239><s%> which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath taken <S%H5337><s%> from our father, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> is ours, and our children's: <S%H1121><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> then, whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, do. <S%H6213><s%>
Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and set <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his wives <S%H802><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> camels; <S%H1581><s%>

And he carried away <S%H5090><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his cattle, <S%H4735><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his goods <S%H7399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had gotten, <S%H7408><s%> the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of his getting, <S%H7075><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had gotten <S%H7408><s%> in Padan-aram, <S%H6307><s%> for to go <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to shear <S%H1494><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sheep: <S%H6629><s%> and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> had stolen <S%H1589><s%> <S%H853><s%> the images <S%H8655><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were her father's. <S%H1><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> stole away <S%H1589><s%> <S%H853><s%> unawares <S%H3820><s%> to Laban <S%H3837><s%> the Syrian, <S%H761><s%> in that <S%H5921><s%> he told <S%H5046><s%> him not <S%H1097><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> fled. <S%H1272><s%>

So he <S%H1931><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had; and he rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the river, <S%H5104><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> toward the mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was fled. <S%H1272><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him seven <S%H7651><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey; <S%H1870><s%> and they overtook <S%H1692><s%> him in the mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> the Syrian <S%H761><s%> in a dream <S%H2472><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Take heed <S%H8104><s%> that <S%H6435><s%> thou speak <S%H1696><s%> not to <S%H5973><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> either good <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2896><s%> or <S%H5704><s%> bad. <S%H7451><s%>

Then Laban <S%H3837><s%> overtook <S%H5381><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> had pitched <S%H8628><s%> <S%H853><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> in the mount: <S%H2022><s%> and Laban <S%H3837><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%> pitched <S%H8628><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> hast thou done, <S%H6213><s%> that thou hast stolen away <S%H1589><s%> <S%H853><s%> unawares <S%H3824><s%> to me, and carried away <S%H5090><s%> <S%H853><s%> my daughters, <S%H1323><s%> as captives <S%H7617><s%> taken with the sword? <S%H2719><s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> didst thou flee away <S%H2244><s%> secretly, <S%H1272><s%> and steal away <S%H1589><s%> from me; and didst not <S%H3808><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me, that I might have sent thee away <S%H7971><s%> with mirth, <S%H8057><s%> and with songs, <S%H7892><s%> with tabret, <S%H8596><s%> and with harp? <S%H3658><s%>

And hast not <S%H3808><s%> suffered <S%H5203><s%> me to kiss <S%H5401><s%> my sons <S%H1121><s%> and my daughters? <S%H1323><s%> thou hast now <S%H6258><s%> done foolishly <S%H5528><s%> in so doing. <S%H6213><s%>

It is <S%H3426><s%> in the power <S%H410><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> you hurt: <S%H7451><s%> but the God <S%H430><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me last night, <S%H570><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Take thou heed <S%H8104><s%> that thou speak <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1696><s%> not to <S%H5973><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> either good <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2896><s%> or <S%H5704><s%> bad. <S%H7451><s%>

And now, <S%H6258><s%> though thou wouldest needs be gone, <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1980><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thou sore longedst <S%H3700><s%> <S%H3700><s%> after thy father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> yet wherefore <S%H4100><s%> hast thou stolen <S%H1589><s%> <S%H853><s%> my gods? <S%H430><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> I was afraid: <S%H3372><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> Peradventure <S%H6435><s%> thou wouldest take by force <S%H1497><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> me.

With <S%H5973><s%> whomsoever <S%H834><s%> thou findest <S%H4672><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy gods, <S%H430><s%> let him not <S%H3808><s%> live: <S%H2421><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> our brethren <S%H251><s%> discern <S%H5234><s%> thou what <S%H4100><s%> is thine with <S%H5973><s%> me, and take <S%H3947><s%> it to thee. For Jacob <S%H3290><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> had stolen <S%H1589><s%> them.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> tent, <S%H168><s%> and into Leah's <S%H3812><s%> tent, <S%H168><s%> and into the two <S%H8147><s%> maidservants' <S%H519><s%> tents; <S%H168><s%> but he found <S%H4672><s%> them not. <S%H3808><s%> Then went <S%H3318><s%> he out of Leah's tent, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H168><s%> <S%H3812><s%> and entered <S%H935><s%> into Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> tent. <S%H168><s%>

Now Rachel <S%H7354><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the images, <S%H8655><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them in the camel's <S%H1581><s%> furniture, <S%H3733><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them. And Laban <S%H3837><s%> searched <S%H4959><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tent, <S%H168><s%> but found <S%H4672><s%> them not. <S%H3808><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> her father, <S%H1><s%> Let it not <S%H408><s%> displease <S%H2734><s%> <S%H5869><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee; for <S%H3588><s%> the custom <S%H1870><s%> of women <S%H802><s%> is upon me. And he searched, <S%H2664><s%> but found <S%H4672><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the images. <S%H8655><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was wroth, <S%H2734><s%> and chided <S%H7378><s%> with Laban: <S%H3837><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is my trespass? <S%H6588><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is my sin, <S%H2403><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou hast so hotly pursued <S%H1814><s%> after <S%H310><s%> me?

Whereas <S%H3588><s%> thou hast searched <S%H4959><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my stuff, <S%H3627><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> hast thou found <S%H4672><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> thy household <S%H1004><s%> stuff? <S%H3627><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> it here <S%H3541><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> my brethren <S%H251><s%> and thy brethren, <S%H251><s%> that they may judge <S%H3198><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us both. <S%H8147><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> have I <S%H595><s%> been with <S%H5973><s%> thee; thy ewes <S%H7353><s%> and thy she goats <S%H5795><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> cast their young, <S%H7921><s%> and the rams <S%H352><s%> of thy flock <S%H6629><s%> have I not <S%H3808><s%> eaten. <S%H398><s%>

That which was torn <S%H2966><s%> of beasts I brought <S%H935><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee; I <S%H595><s%> bore the loss <S%H2398><s%> of it; of my hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> didst thou require <S%H1245><s%> it, whether stolen <S%H1589><s%> by day, <S%H3117><s%> or stolen <S%H1589><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

Thus I was; <S%H1961><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> the drought <S%H2721><s%> consumed <S%H398><s%> me, and the frost <S%H7140><s%> by night; <S%H3915><s%> and my sleep <S%H8142><s%> departed <S%H5074><s%> from mine eyes. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5869><s%>

Thus <S%H2088><s%> have I been twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in thy house; <S%H1004><s%> I served <S%H5647><s%> thee fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for thy two <S%H8147><s%> daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for thy cattle: <S%H6629><s%> and thou hast changed <S%H2498><s%> <S%H853><s%> my wages <S%H4909><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> times. <S%H4489><s%>

Except <S%H3884><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my father, <S%H1><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and the fear <S%H6343><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> with me, surely <S%H3588><s%> thou hadst sent me away <S%H7971><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> empty. <S%H7387><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine affliction <S%H6040><s%> and the labor <S%H3018><s%> of my hands, <S%H3709><s%> and rebuked <S%H3198><s%> thee last night. <S%H570><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> These daughters <S%H1323><s%> are my daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and these children <S%H1121><s%> are my children, <S%H1121><s%> and these cattle <S%H6629><s%> are my cattle, <S%H6629><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> seest <S%H7200><s%> is mine: and what <S%H4100><s%> can I do <S%H6213><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> unto these <S%H428><s%> my daughters, <S%H1323><s%> or <S%H176><s%> unto their children <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have born? <S%H3205><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore come <S%H1980><s%> thou, let us make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant, <S%H1285><s%> I <S%H589><s%> and thou; <S%H859><s%> and let it be <S%H1961><s%> for a witness <S%H5707><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and thee.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a stone, <S%H68><s%> and set it up <S%H7311><s%> for a pillar. <S%H4676><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his brethren, <S%H251><s%> Gather <S%H3950><s%> stones; <S%H68><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> an heap: <S%H1530><s%> and they did eat <S%H398><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the heap. <S%H1530><s%>
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> it Jegar-sahadutha: <S%H3026><s%> but Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> it Galeed. <S%H1567><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> is a witness <S%H5707><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and thee this day. <S%H3117><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> was the name <S%H8034><s%> of it called <S%H7121><s%> Galeed; <S%H1567><s%>

And Mizpah; <S%H4709><s%> for <S%H834><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> watch <S%H6822><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and thee, when <S%H3588><s%> we are absent <S%H5641><s%> one <S%H376><s%> from another. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7453><s%>
